java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
ShadowAbsoluteLayout, ShadowAdapterView, ShadowFrameLayout, ShadowLinearLayout, ShadowMapView
@Implements(value=android.view.ViewGroup.class)
public class ShadowViewGroup
extends ShadowView

Shadow for ViewGroup that simulates its implementation
